Hi Marcello,

as have been written above, you should be able to do
`gradient(x -> sum(gradient(x -> loss(x,y), x)[1]), x)`

but unfortunately the logitcrossentropy is not written to be twice differentiable (techinically it is because of the gradient of softmax), so the above will fail.
